Constructor parameters in org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.impl.similarity with type arguments of type GenericItemSimilarity.ItemItemSimilarity
GenericItemSimilarity(Iterable<GenericItemSimilarity.ItemItemSimilarity> similarities)
           Creates a GenericItemSimilarity from a precomputed list of GenericItemSimilarity.ItemItemSimilaritys.
GenericItemSimilarity(Iterable<GenericItemSimilarity.ItemItemSimilarity> similarities, int maxToKeep)
           Like GenericItemSimilarity.GenericItemSimilarity(Iterable), but will only keep the specified number of similarities from the given Iterable of similarities.
